page.title: 12Cecilia and Karen's Families
page.content: On Sundays I get up at 9.00 for church at 9.30. Then I have a small breakfast of a bowl of cereal, then we go to church. {Oh bliss get up at 10.00 and have a {late breakfast, then slowly get ready {for the day. Dad disappears {upstairs, Mum reads, I play. After church I change. Dad also gets ready and then he disappears into the garden. {Upstairs Dad paints away happily. {Sometimes I go swimming if it's really {hot. Mum gets the lunch ready and at 1.00 we have the roast dinner. I play around and read. Then Mum and Dad start gardening. {We have a Sunday dinner at 1.00_2.00. {In the evening I sometimes play tennis {with Dad in the summer if I'm fit {enough. }
